svg.text: Infrastructure Components & Deployment Pipeline with Mobile App Access

g.text: Development → Staging → Production • Blue-Green Deployment • Zero-Downtime Updates
Automatic Rollback on Failure • Health Checks • Progressive Deployment
Multi-Region Deployment • CDN Integration • Auto-scaling • SSL/TLS Termination
Environment Variables Management • Secret Management • Database Connections
Real-time Alerts • PagerDuty Integration • Slack Notifications • SMS/Email Alerts
Automated Incident Detection • Escalation Policies • Mean Time to Recovery: <15 minutes
Full deployment architecture visible • Real-time pipeline monitoring • Infrastructure control
Mobile deployment triggers • Alert management • Performance dashboards

svg.text: FinergyCloud Production Deployment Architecture - Infrastructure Components, CI/CD Pipeline & Complete Mobile App Access
